name: The Squeeze
description:
Every morning during Feral Vector, a bunch of Bitsyfolk came together at a local cafe called Squeeze for breakfast and hangouts. This is merely a slice of that experience, featuring only a few of the many fantastic and wonderful people who showed up!

Many thanks to my friends, both near and far. And special thanks to Freya for helping me come up with some dialog ideas!

Made with Adam Le Doux's wonderful Bitsy game creator.
